typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Brand as string,
		{Major Brand} as string,
		Manufacturer as string,
		{Parent Company} as string,
		{Sub Category} as string,
		Category as string,
		Aisle as string,
		Department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	wildcardPaths:['cups_plates.csv']) ~> cupsPlatesDimSource
cupsPlatesDimSource select(mapColumn(
		each(patternMatch(`.*`),
			regexReplace($$, ' ', '_') = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ReplaceSpaceWithUnderScore
ReplaceSpaceWithUnderScore sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> cupsPlatesDimSink
